synopsis.text:
In the year 2028, Tokyo is on the brink of unveiling a towering new skyscraper, but lurking in the shadows is a sinister force from a parallel world - the Lucifer Hawk. The city's defense lies in the hands of the Attacked Mystification Police (AMP), a covert team of supernaturally gifted policewomen, led by the enigmatic Rally Cheyenne.

Katsumi Liqueur, a Japanese-American woman, finds herself inadvertently thrust into this world of magic and monsters when a detour through a back alley brings her face-to-face with a Lucifer Hawk. Despite her skepticism about the supernatural, Katsumi possesses a unique power that makes her an invaluable asset to the AMP. But joining the fight is the last thing on her mind as she grapples with her mother's illness.

As the AMP prepares for a showdown at the new skyscraper, Katsumi defies orders and confronts the Lucifer Hawk alone, armed with her powerful weapon, the Sword King Grospoliner. The battle forces Katsumi to confront not just the monster, but also her own past and the mysterious connection she shares with the AMP.

This personal journey, intertwined with high-stakes battles and supernatural intrigue, makes Katsumi's story more than just a fight against evil. It's a tale of self-discovery, acceptance, and the courage to embrace one's destiny.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
